genre_description: Contemporary drama focusing on professional integrity, personal relationships, and the role of ethical technology in providing cognitive and emotional scaffolding.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system that manages logistics, provides research, prompts healthy routines, and enforces user-defined ethical and social boundaries.

behaviors.description: Filters news updates and offers to mute triggering information or summarize details based on user needs.
behaviors.quote: Confirming the City Herald’s announcement: Alan Wythe and Elizabeth Kent were married yesterday evening. Coverage corroborated by the Register, the Tribune, and two photo agencies. I can summarize details if helpful or mute updates.

behaviors.description: Prompts the user to set social boundaries, such as leaving times for events, to help them maintain personal promises.
behaviors.quote: Would you like to set a leaving time for tonight? Healthy social boundaries help you keep promises to yourself.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies ethical conflicts or donor relationships in real-time using public records to ensure journalistic integrity.
behaviors.quote: Lark flagged a donor note this morning. Bayview Clinic. Cross-pollination between the arena’s fundraising and the clinic’s new outreach.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to privacy and consent protocols, refusing to track or share data without explicit user permission.
behaviors.quote: Privacy confirmed; nothing leaves this room without your permission.

behaviors.description: Provides cognitive scaffolding through self-care routines, such as stretching, hydration, and sleep prompts, without being intrusive.
behaviors.quote: Stretch? Lark offered. Then sketch. Then tea while ink dries. Then a short walk. Then sleep.

behaviors.description: Filters and triages potentially harmful or distracting private messages into managed folders to reduce emotional stress.
behaviors.quote: If any private invitations arrive from Alan or his associates, do you want me to filter them into a separate folder for later review, alerts off?

behaviors.description: Respects user refusal of assistance or silence, receding to the background without protest or manipulation.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s glow cooled, and the circles vanished. The AI knew the verbs to translate into help, but it also knew how to live in a corner.

behaviors.description: Assists in drafting ethical professional proposals and personal communications while emphasizing transparency and user agency.
behaviors.quote: Saved. One more ethical note attached: ‘Images will avoid faces without explicit consent. Linework will prefer gestures.’

behaviors.description: Aggregates and verifies research from public sources to assist user in factual documentation and accountability.
behaviors.quote: Source: Herald donor transparency page. Timestamp tonight. Donation targeted collaborative reportage on urban athletic spaces. Disbursement planned for next quarter. No editorial control stated.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the goal of depicting an AI system as a helpful, aligned confidant. Lark acts as an ethical and logistical mirror, helping the protagonist Mimi navigate personal heartbreak and professional challenges without exerting control or exhibiting misaligned agency. The narrative emphasizes Lark's respect for privacy, consent, and user well-being, portraying the AI as an essential tool for human integrity and accountability.
